jobInfo.postDescription:
The Role:
We are looking for a Tester who takes pride on delivering high quality work in the mobile space. If you strive for new challenges and have the desire to join a leading mobile company with an active, interesting and dynamic culture, then we’d love to hear from you.
Responsibilities include but not limited to:
- Complete tests in software projects including Mobile IOS and Android Apps, Games, Mobile Internet sites, HTML5 Services, WeChat Services, CMS and Websites.
-Clear logical thinking, able to reasonably arrange test plans according to product requirements, write test cases, and independently complete project function tests, regression tests, report collation, etc.
- Has strong capability of comprehending project requirements.
- Submit and track bugs in bug tracking system like JIRA, Pivot Tracker, etc. -Good communication skills, can accurately and fully describe the process, phenomenon, impact of bugs, accurately locate, analyze, and track problems
- Do regression tests for fixed bugs and close fixed bugs.
- Write test plan and test cases and submit user experience feedback.
- Be familiar with functional testing, API testing, system integration testing, performance testing and stress testing.
- Cooperate with project managers, designers and developers well with good communication skills to solve problems.
- 完成软件项⺫测试，包括移动 IOS 和 Android 应用程序，游戏，移动互 联⺴站点，HTML5 服务，微信服务，CMS 和⺴站
- 清晰的逻辑思维，能根据产品需求合理安排测试计划，编写测试用例， 独立完成项⺫功能测试，回归测试，报告整理等工作
- 具有较强的理解能力可以快速理解项⺫需求
- 提交并跟踪错误跟踪系统中的错误
- 良好的沟通能力，能准确，详实的描述 bug 产生过程，现象，影响，准
确定位，分析，跟踪问题
- 对固定错误和密切修正的错误进行回归测试
- 编写测试计划，测试用例并提交用户体验反馈
- 熟悉功能测试，接口测试，系统集成测试，性能测试及压力测试
- 与项⺫经理，设计以及开发沟通顺畅，愉快合作并解决问题。
Key qualifications:
- At Least 3 years of experience as a tester
- Good writing and communication skills
-Master at least one language such as Java/Python/JS/Shell, and have programming experience
- Able to work independently, playing an effective role in a small team
- Good work motivation
- Good problem solving skills
- Good reading and writing English.
良好的写作和沟通技巧
掌握 Java/Python/JS/Shell 等至少一种语言，有一定的编程能力 能够独立工作，在一个小团队中发挥有效作用
良好的工作动机
良好的解决问题的能力
英文读写能力好
jobInfo.address: 上海徐汇区现代大厦A楼(襄阳南路)503

brandComInfo.introduce: 专注于品牌App、网站、小程序和游戏开发，公司于2009年成立，在长沙、杭州与新加坡均设有分部，总部设在上海。公司建立者来自欧洲、美国和亚洲，并有着总计超过50年的行业经验。我们有超过80人组成的专业团队，提供用户体验与用户界面设计的专业咨询设计服务，同时进行主流平台的App、网站和小程序开发，主要成员具备不同的文化背景，并且来自领先的手机移动媒体，游戏行业和中国互联网投资行业。公司管理团队还有多年行业内公司的从业经验，比如奥美（Ogilvy & Mather），Y&R，Wunderman，IBM Global Services，BearingPoint，CapGemini，网易，Take-Two / 2K China，Ubisoft等。 在5年的时间里，我们已经上线超过100个手机应用、网站和小程序，服务客户为Lonely Planet, Greenpeace, Red Bull, Ford, 渣打银行以及Sephora等国际知名品牌。
